name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.max.block.acquire.failures
description: Maximum failures allowed when trying to get block information from a specific datanode.

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.retry-after-no-speculate
description:
The waiting time(ms) to do next round of speculation
  if there is no task speculated in this round.

name: dfs.namenode.max.full.block.report.leases
description:
The maximum number of leases for full block reports that the
    NameNode will issue at any given time.  This prevents the NameNode from
    being flooded with full block reports that use up all the RPC handler
    threads.  This number should never be more than the number of RPC handler
    threads or less than 1.

name: mapreduce.job.ubertask.maxmaps
description:
Threshold for number of maps, beyond which job is considered
  too big for the ubertasking optimization.  Users may override this value,
  but only downward.

name: hadoop.http.cross-origin.max-age
description:
The number of seconds a pre-flighted request can be cached
    for web services needing cross-origin (CORS) support.
